data.name: msgAddDB
data.value: Adding songs: {0} / {1}...|A conditional database add is in progress.

data.name: msgAddDBAlbum
data.value: Adding songs to album: {0} / {1}...|A conditional database album add is in progress.

data.name: msgDefault
data.value: Default|Default as in default album

data.name: msgIDSong
data.value: Identifying songs: {0} / {1}...|Songs are identified based on the database song data.

data.name: msgInQueue
data.value: In queue: {0}|How many songs ar in the queue

data.name: msgLoadingAlbum
data.value: Loading album '{0}'...|Text for loading an album (enumerating files and their tags)

data.name: msgLoadMeta
data.value: Metadata loading: {0} / {1}...|Song metadata(tags) is being loaded.

data.name: msgPause
data.value: Pause|Pause playback

data.name: msgPlay
data.value: Play|Play a song or resume paused

data.name: msgReadingTags
data.value: Reading tags {0}...|The program is reading tag information from music files

data.name: msgUnsupportedExt
data.value: Unsupported file extension.|The file extension is not in the list of supported file types.

data.name: msgUpdateDB
data.value: Updating song list: {0} / {1}...|A conditional database update is in progress.

data.name: msgWorking
data.value: Working...|The program is loading something

data.name: msgAboutTitle
data.value: About - {0}|About as in about

data.name: msgVersionText
data.value: Version {0}|As in version

data.name: msgQueue
data.value: Queue|As in a queue snapshot

data.name: msgError
data.value: Error|A common error that should be defined in another message

data.name: msgInformation
data.value: Information|Some information is given to the user, do add more definitive message to make some sense to the 'information'...

data.name: msgQueueSomething
data.value: Please add some songs to the queue.|Ask in nicely ask the user to queue some songs.

data.name: msgTmpAlbumError
data.value: The current album is temporary album.{0}Please create an album with a name before continuing.|Album is a temporary one i.e. you clicked a music file and the program started. Can't save a anything against a temporary album.

data.name: msgConfirmation
data.value: Confirm|Used in a dialog title to ask for a confirmation to do something

data.name: msgModifyQueueCaption
data.value: Modify saved queue [{0}]|A text to display in the window title where a saved queue is being modified

data.name: msgRemoveQueueSnapshot
data.value: Are you sure you want to remove queue snapshot {0}?|A confirmation question if a queue snapshot can be removed when asked from the user

data.name: msgQuietHours
data.value: [Quiet hours ({0} - {1})]|As in quiet hours defined in the settings are occurring now :-(

data.name: msgRemoteWCFFailed
data.value: Remote control HTTP binding failed to initialize ({0}) with an exception {1}.|As in the WCF self-hosting web service failed to initialize.

data.name: msgExportQueueTo
data.value: Export queue to file|As in export a queue snapshot to a file

data.name: msgFileExt_amp_qex
data.value: amp# queue export files (*.amp#_qex)|*.amp#_qex|as in the combo box to select file type from a dialog

data.name: msgFileExt_m3u
data.value: M3U playlist files (*.m3u;*.m3u8)|*.m3u;*.m3u8|as in the combo box to select file type from a dialog

data.name: msgImportQueueFrom
data.value: Import queue from file|As in import a queue snapshot from a file

data.name: msgOpenPlaylistFile
data.value: Open playlist file|As in open a play list file (m3u)

data.name: msgSavePlaylistFile
data.value: Save playlist file|As in export an album to a playlist file (m3u)

data.name: msgAlbum
data.value: Album|As in a name of an album of a music file

data.name: msgAlternateQueue
data.value: Alternate queue index|As an alternate queue index of a music file

data.name: msgArtists
data.value: "Artist|As in an artist(s) of a music file

data.name: msgErrorInScript
data.value: A script error occurred on the database update|Something failed during running the database update script

data.name: msgMusicFileRenamed
data.value: I named this song my self|The user has renamed the song him self

data.name: msgQueueTag
data.value: Queue index|As a queue index of a music file

data.name: msgTitle
data.value: Title|As in a title of a music file

data.name: msgTrackNO
data.value: Track number|As a track number of a song in a music album

data.name: msgQueueCopyFlat
data.value: Copy songs into a single directory|A title to a folder select dialog indicating that files in a queue should be copied into a single directory.

data.name: msgQueryDownloadNewVersion
data.value: A new version is available to download. Download now?|A message describing that a new version of the software is available to download and the user is asked whether to download it now.

data.name: msgQueryNewVersionTitle
data.value: New version is available|A dialog title informing a user of a new version download possibility

data.name: msgQueryDeleteAlbum
data.value: Really delete album named: '{0}'?|A confirmation query for the user that a deletion of an album is intended.

data.name: msgProcessingFiles
data.value: Processing files...|A message describing a possible lenghty operation with files is running.

data.name: msgProgressPercentage
data.value: Progress: {0} %|A message describing some operation progress in percentage.

data.name: msgQueryConvertToMP3
data.value: Convert non-MP3 files to MP3 format?|A query to ask whether to convert files other than MP3 to MP3 format.

data.name: msgUserDataExportError
data.value: An error occurred while exporting the user data.|Something failed during compressing the user data to a ZIP file

data.name: msgQueryUserShutdownProgram
data.value: Please close the software so the backup can be restored.|A message informing the user that the close the software that the backup zip file can be restored.

data.name: msgQueryUserDeleteNonExistingSongs
data.value: Really delete non-existing files from the database?|A message requesting for user confirmation to delete non-existing files from the database.

data.name: msgDatabaseUpdate
data.value: Database update|A message describing that the software is updating it's database.

data.name: msgSoftwareWillRestart
data.value: The software will now restart for the changes to take affect.|A message informing the user that the software will restart for the changes to take affect.

data.name: msgPercentageNumber
data.value: {0} %|A message describing a percentage number value

data.name: msgNewAlbum
data.value: New album|A dialog title to add a new album

data.name: msgSaveAlbumAs
data.value: Save album as|A dialog title to save an existing album with a new name

data.name: msgErrorRest
data.value: Error initializing the RESTful API with port: {0} with exception: '{1}'.

data.name: msgAddMusic
data.value: Add music|A dialog title to add music to the play list from a folder or from selected files

data.value: Music files|*.mp3;*.ogg;*.wav;*.wma;*.m4a;*.aac;*.aif;*.aiff;*.flac
